snippet: Roy Hibbert scored 24 points to help Indiana improve its N.B.A.-best record to 19-3 and extend its conference lead to three games.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Indiana Pacers defeat Miami Heat, 90-84; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Roy Hibbert scored 24 points to help Indiana improve its N.B.A.-best record to 19-3 and extend its conference lead to three games.

headline.main: Pacers Top Heat in Eastern Conference Showdown
headline.print_headline: Pacers Top Heat in Eastern Conference Showdown
